#summary Building for Android

= Introduction =

you can [http://code.google.com/p/caldav4j/source/browse/android/bin/Calendar.apk download the .apk] or rebuild it.
To build it yourself, 
 # get the android branch code, 
   svn checkout http://caldav4j.googlecode.com/svn/android/ caldav4j-android
 # import the project into eclipse as existing android code 
 # build it and run.
